dialogues.subtitles: This doesn't seem right, the atmosphere in this place is disturbing
Follow my lead, Yen, I know this forest like the palm of my hand
We can rest in that bonfire if Yennefer from the School of the Snail needs to
Since you arrived, Ciri disappeared and the Nilfgaardian may have captured her...
Fuck, first your complaints, now this damned rocks... I'm getting angry
Tension sprout up in the couple as the enemy forces did not dwindle
Geralt and Yen inwardly debated the context behind the explosion...
The couple was oblivious of what was the reason behind the thunder...
Break this roots, you peasants, so we get Ciri to the Emperor!
Ciri! Wait... Yen, all this carnage, something is not right...
We must now heal her and get the hell out of this place... The three of us, together again
That one died recently; monsters may be ahead. Perform this time, Yen
eeeeerhghgh protet home protet hoomeee
Ciri's Aura... The cave! Damn it Yen, run before it's too late!
The cave! Ciri surely went this way! Run, Yen
Somehow, barrels then fell from a dwarven fort...
Our champions traversed the scenery hoping not to find Ciri between the corpses
They realized Ciri could be dead, captured, or may now be a savage beast
Yen, Ciri's been in the woods for days, we must set off to find her
Fuck! The Nilfgaardian? In Kaer Morhen? What are they doing so far north?
Ciri's Aura? Mmm, let's track it, more pulses may be in the forest
Ciri went through this logs in her training. Watch out, mistress
Geralt, I know how to track Ciri, I'll be the guide now, you stay behind me
There! Her aura again! Poor child, if only you didn't sent her in this ridiculous trial...
Geralt, you guided us to this shithole while Ciri may be in trouble
I sense magical pulses... Abrupt, irregular... Ciri?
Those dead soldiers... Oh, heavens! Was it the ghouls... Or Ciri?
We freed her, Geralt! We saved Ciri! Oh, Geralt, I'm sorry it had to be this way
Ciri, the shockwave... We need to figure out what happened
